name: Speech Bubble
author: VannyBean

sections.description:
Inspired by the wonderful expressions babies make, this plugin allows you to impose speech bubbles on top of images in order to add captions.
It does not have to be a baby or anything about kids for that matter; it works wonderfuly for images with lots of expressions.

Please feel free to visit VannyBean for any questions or more information.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Download and unzip the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In a blog post or page you should now see a caption button on the rich text editor menu (far right).
  4. Click the icon, then click on top of the image where you want the caption to appear.

short_description: Allows you to enter captions inside of speech bubbles on top of images.
